EmailTemplate.name: NA_Commercial_Financial Services_Cold_Nurture.FinancialServices_Cold_Nurture_Com
EmailTemplate.subject: Workload Automation for IT Environments in Financial Services
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
The success of every financial transaction relies on the IT infrastructure reporting it and milliseconds are the difference between making and losing millions.
<[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kGys-SMBBIg]]>
Watch this video <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kGys-SMBBIg]]> to see how you can ensure business-critical workloads get the resources they need when they need them.
In an industry where millisecond delays can cost hundreds of millions, how would those performance improvements impact your business?
Regards,
Team Turbonomic
<[[turbonomic.com]]>
